Author: Blooym
Name: GoodFriend
Punchline: Improvements to the in-game friend system, including login and logout notifications for your friends, and more.
Description:
Key Features:
- Send and receive notifications when your friend using GoodFriend log in and log out.
- Chat messages showing how many of your friends are online when you log in.

Developers note on using this plugin after 7.0:
As of Patch 7.0 some data GoodFriend uses to identify players in events has become available to everyone who is nearby your character in-game, not just your friends and party members; GoodFriend itself will still only show notifications for people you have added on your in-game friends list, but please only use this plugin if you're comfortable with your login/logout events being theoretically visible to people not on your friends list.
